content.description: A student wrote the following procedure to calculate the sum of the integers from 1 to 5.
content.question: The student later decides to modify the procedure to calculate the sum of the integers from 1 to max, which represents any positive integer greater than 1. Which of the following changes should be made to the procedure to meet the studentâ€™s goal? The procedure should take max as an input parameter. The condition in the REPEAT UNTIL block should be changed to count > max. The condition in the REPEAT UNTIL block should be changed to max < 5.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Use abstraction to manage complexity in a program.
